Uses of Class
gov.sandia.cognition.statistics.distribution.BernoulliDistribution

  • Packages that use BernoulliDistribution 
    Package Description
    gov.sandia.cognition.learning.function.categorization
    Provides functions that output a discrete set of categories.
    gov.sandia.cognition.statistics.bayesian.conjugate
    Provides Bayesian estimation routines based on conjugate prior distribution of parameters of specific conditional distributions.
    gov.sandia.cognition.statistics.distribution
    Provides statistical distributions.

      BernoulliDistribution AbstractConfidenceWeightedBinaryCategorizer.evaluateAsBernoulli(Vectorizable input) 
      BernoulliDistribution ConfidenceWeightedBinaryCategorizer.evaluateAsBernoulli(Vectorizable input)
      Returns a Bernoulli distribution over the output of the distribution of weight vectors times the input, with the confidence that the categorizer was trained using.
